akn:section.akn:heading: Development of plans for the delivery of workforce development services.

akn:content.akn:p: The Mayor shall develop a plan for the delivery of workforce development services for the summer youth jobs program required by ยง 32-241(a)(1).
The Mayor shall develop a plan for the delivery of workforce development services for the out-of-school year-round employment program required by ยง 32-241(a)(3).
The plans required by this section shall include the following components:
In the development of the plans required by this section, the Mayor shall consult with youth workforce development stakeholders, experts, and providers.
Within 120 days of September 24, 2010, the Mayor shall submit the plans required by this section to the Council for its approval. Upon approval by the Council, the Mayor shall implement the plans.
